message.content:
cs.MM, cs.NI, cs.CV, cs.GT, cs.IT 

Reasoning: 
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper focuses on immersive media streaming, especially VR/360-degree video streaming, which falls under the multimedia category. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper proposes a scheme to jointly exploit the available bandwidth from LTE and Wi-Fi networks, which is related to networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper utilizes the saliency of video and prediction of users' view to obtain an optimal association of users with different Wi-Fi access points, which involves computer vision and pattern recognition techniques. 
- cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory): The paper proposes a buffer strategy to mitigate the influence of short-time prediction problem, which can be related to game theory. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper aims to achieve better QoE perceived by users by jointly exploiting the available bandwidth from LTE and Wi-Fi networks, which can be related to information theory.
